snippet: There are barbacoa and artisan sausages, Persian stews and Thai delicacies. Keeping kosher does not mean having to eschew the ethnic food seen only on television.
abstract: Kosher options available in Los Angeles have become exciting and keeping kosher does not mean eschewing ethnic food only seen on television.
lead_paragraph: There are barbacoa and artisan sausages, Persian stews and Thai delicacies. Keeping kosher does not mean having to eschew the ethnic food seen only on television.

headline.seo: Kosher in Los Angeles Covers Many Cultures
headline.main: Los Angeles Kosher: Beyond Corned Beef and a Knish
headline.print_headline: Los Angeles Kosher: Beyond Corned Beef and a Knish
